org.apache.flink.runtime.state.memory

类 AbstractMemState<K,N,SV,S extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State,SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.AbstractHeapState<K,N,SV,S,SD,MemoryStateBackend>
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.memory.AbstractMemState<K,N,SV,S,SD>
  • 类型参数:
    K - The type of the key.
    N - The type of the namespace.
    SV - The type of the values in the state.
    S - The type of State
    SD - The type of StateDescriptor for the State S
    所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State, KvState<K,N,S,SD,MemoryStateBackend>
    直接已知子类:
    MemFoldingState, MemListState, MemReducingState, MemValueState

    public abstract class AbstractMemState<K,N,SV,S extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State,SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?>>
extends AbstractHeapState<K,N,SV,S,SD,MemoryStateBackend>
    Base class for partitioned ListState implementations that are backed by a regular heap hash map. The concrete implementations define how the state is checkpointed.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.flink.runtime.state.AbstractHeapState

    • 方法详细资料

      • createHeapSnapshot

        public abstract KvStateSnapshot<K,N,S,SD,MemoryStateBackend> createHeapSnapshot(byte[] bytes)

      • snapshot

        public KvStateSnapshot<K,N,S,SD,MemoryStateBackend> snapshot(long checkpointId,
                                                             long timestamp)
                                                      throws Exception
        从接口复制的说明: KvState
        Creates a snapshot of this state.
        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint for which the snapshot should be created.
        timestamp - The timestamp of the checkpoint.
        返回:
        A snapshot handle for this key/value state.
        抛出:
        Exception - Exceptions during snapshotting the state should be forwarded, so the system can react to failed snapshots.
